verses.name: Leviticus 15:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses and to Aaron, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 15:2
verses.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, and say unto them, When any man hath a running issue out of his flesh, because of his issue he is unclean.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:3
verses.text: And this shall be his uncleanness in his issue: whether his flesh run with his issue, or his flesh be stopped from his issue, it is his uncleanness.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:4
verses.text: Every bed, whereon he lieth that hath the issue, is unclean: and every thing, whereon he sitteth, shall be unclean.
